item.description:
As mentioned on the message boards, TempleCon will be in Providence this weekend, Friday-Sunday. As far as I am aware, there will be many RPG, CCG, LAN, and other games running all weekend!

I'll be running a game as well, from 12-5 on Saturday- a dungeon crawl in Rappan Athuk. I'll have pre-generated characters available, one for each character class, or you can bring your own 6th-level core character. People can come and go as they want, so let's see how far into the Dungeon of Graves we can get!
item.name: TempleCon
